synopsis.text:
Of course, the arrival of the enigmatic and charming Shion at Keibu High School stirs up quite a buzz, thanks to her captivating personality and remarkable athletic prowess. Little does everyone know, Shion is actually an AI undergoing a crucial testing phase! With a unique mission to bring joy to the introverted Satomi, Shion takes an unexpected approach â€“ belting out heartfelt tunes right in the middle of class.

Upon discovering Shion's AI identity, Satomi and her old pal, the engineering whiz Toma, find themselves gradually warming up to their new classmate. Alongside the ever-popular Gotchan, the feisty Aya, and the judo club's very own 'Thunder,' they find themselves drawn to Shion's enchanting voice and genuine nature, even as her quirky behavior leaves them baffled.

However, Shion's well-intentioned actions for Satomi's benefit soon plunge them all into a whirlwind of chaos. Prepare for a touching tale of an endearing AI and her classmates, as they navigate the complexities of friendship, trust, and finding happiness in the most unexpected places.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
